snippet: Pakistan's new batting coach Grant Flower has termed his new assignment as the biggest challenge of his coaching career and is hopeful of making the batsmen more consistent....

headline.print_headline: Flower Vows to Make Pakistan Batsmen More Consistent
headline.main: Flower Vows to Make Pakistan Batsmen More Consistent

lead_paragraph: Pakistan's new batting coach Grant Flower has termed his new assignment as the biggest challenge of his coaching career and is hopeful of making the batsmen more consistent.
